timeline.message:
Move raw search controls out of SearchPage.tsx

Should be included in SearchBar.tsx.
Add raw search controls to Searchbar component

Add dependency to rawSearchMode in debouncedQuery

Otherwise state does not update properly. Was not an issue when
rawSearchMode was controlled by the parent component.

timeline.bodyText: I think debouncedQuery does not need to depend on rawSearchMode.
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: yes, it does. Without that the state messes up.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused

replies.bodyText:
Otherwise, this will happen:

turn switch on
make query
non-raw search happens.
Make query again
raw search happens.
Turn switch off
make query
raw search happens
make query again
non-raw search happens.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused
